name: index.html
description: Main HTML file for the calculator app.

features.name: User-friendly interface
features.description: Intuitive and easy-to-use interface for a seamless user experience.

features.name: Basic arithmetic operations
features.description: Ability to perform basic arithmetic operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

features.name: Memory functions
features.description: Support for memory functions like memory storage, recall, and clearing.

features.name: Scientific functions
features.description: Include scientific functions like square root, exponents, trigonometric functions, and logarithms.

features.name: History log
features.description: Trace and review the calculation history with a history log feature.

features.name: Theme customization
features.description: Allow users to customize the theme or appearance of the calculator.

code:
<!-- This is the main HTML file for the calculator app -->
<!-- Add your HTML code here for implementing the calculator functionality -->
file_instruction: This file serves as the main HTML file for the calculator app. Add your HTML code here to implement the calculator functionalities mentioned in the features.
